text: Is there anyway to get a raw and uncached asset? `_hcms/raw-resource` used to be a thing but is no longer available. We need to use the same stylesheet on HubSpot (hosted on HubSpot) as well as on a 3rd party site

Hi everyone, I hope I'm asking this question in the right place. I am getting an error while I am authorising my client app with an external HubSpot account by using the OAuth 2.0 flow, though I don't get this error when I try this with my developer test account. I am authorising for these scopes: `content, automation, forms, tickets, e-commerce, sales-email-read, crm.objects.contacts.read, crm.schemas.contacts.read, crm.objects.feedback_submissions.read`  Anyone know what the problem is?

I wasn’t sure what channel to post this in. Does the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/debugging-and-errors#developer-info|Developer Info> not work with HubSpot CMS Free? When I try to access it, I get an error that says ‘this page is not available’. I’m trying to retrieve values using <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context|export_to_template_context> and the dev info would be helpful in finding the correct parameter…which brings up my second question. Is `export_to_template_context` available with HubSpot CMS Free?

Hello community,

MARKETING & SALES ENTERPRISE

I have done with satisfaction the connection of the HubSpot application with Data Factory - DataLake, but at the moment of getting the information I only get half of my records of the Contacts object (530.913). How could I do to get 100% of the records of that object?

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/How-to-get-all-records-of-the-contact-object-connected-to-Data/td-p/680706|HubSpot COMMUNITY>

Someone who can help me please.

Is there any way to get the search module to include pages in content staging? Of course, I understand that generally, this would NOT be desired! But we have a new site with tons of content in staging and the client wants to test search functionality before publishing pages. Any ideas?

hi
how i can install in at least three active unique ?
